AI Description: NCBI AMRFinderPlus is a web-based tool that enables the identification of antimicrobial resistance (AMR) genes in bacterial genomes. It uses a curated database of AMR gene sequences to accurately detect and classify known resistance mechanisms.
Core Features: Identification Of Antimicrobial Resistance Genes, Classification Of Resistance Mechanisms, Utilizes Curated Amr Gene Sequence Database, Web-Based Interface
